mapper.select: SELECT b.bat_grp_id, b.bat_grp_nm, b.bat_grp_dsc, b.host_id, h.host_nm, h.host_ip, h.host_pt, b.auto_excn_yn, b.cron from (select rownum as bat_grp_id, bat_grp_nm, bat_grp_dsc, host_id, auto_excn_yn, cron from(select bat_grp_id, bat_grp_nm, bat_grp_dsc, host_id, auto_excn_yn, cron from bat_grp order by bat_grp_id desc) where rownum <= #{endRowNo}) b left outer join host h on b.host_id=h.host_id where b.use_yn='Y'
